summary: Page 54 (book page 74) captures sections סב through סח plus grouping header 'עבירה'. Structure and section numbering are correct. Some minor text and source ref issues.

issues.description: OCR has 'שהיו הקנטים מכניס מומו' - the word 'הקנטים' seems like an OCR error. Image may show 'הקנאים' (the zealots). Also 'מכניס' may be 'מכניסו'.
OCR title has 'עה"פ' which may be 'עוה"פ' (עוד הפעם). Image shows abbreviated form.
OCR has '[?]' marker: 'דלהוי [?] כעשה מצוה'. The unclear word needs verification from image.
Source ref 'תיבת גמא משפטים' - verify against image. Image shows this appears correct.
